import './PlayerBar.less' import { useState } from 'react'; import { connect, useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Slider } from 'antd'; function FootPlay () { const [isPlaying, setIsPlaying] = useState(false); const [progress, setProgress] = useState(0); const { currentSong } = useSelector((state) => ({/**从redux仓库里面获得数据 */ currentSong: state.player.currentSong })); // console.log("currentSong") // console.log(currentSong) return (
上一首 播放/暂停 下一首
{currentSong?.al?.name} {currentSong?.name}
00:00 / 00:00
画中画歌词 收藏 分享
已添加到播放列表 0
循环
) } export default FootPlay
